official_title: Visiting Associate Professor of Practice in Management Communications
bio:
Bee Leng is Visiting Associate Professor of Practice in Management Communication.  She teaches the course “Organizational Communication in Its Social Context”. Before coming to NYU Shanghai, she was Executive Director of HiBEAM, Hawaii’s earliest virtual accelerator. She taught strategic management and organizational behavior at The Chinese University of Hong Kong and Hawaii Pacific University and co-founded their entrepreneurship centers. 

In October 2010, Bee Leng received the Distinguished Alumnus Award of the College of Fine Arts and Communication of the University of Wisconsin at Stevens Point and was its 2013 commencement speaker.

Research Interests

  • Entrepreneurial Teams
  • Leadership
  • Careers in Entrepreneurial Firms

 

Education

  • PhD, Organizational Communication, Ohio University
  • MA, Southeast Asia Studies, Ohio University
  • BS, Communication Studies, University of Wisconsin at Stevens Point
